alert.note: Alert for Hartley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:22AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Hartley County through 300 AM CDT... At 222 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Romero to 16 miles southwest of Hartley. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Channing and Romero. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas.
